name: Emergynce
description:
Emergynce is a simple maze game, but with a twist- you can only see one direction of walls at a time. 

Freeplay - The levels are procedurally generated, meaning that there are infinite levels to play, and they are different each time you play. 

Level Editor - Emergynce also features a level editor with a custom size. The levels can even be saved and shared with your friends.

Arrow keys to move.
